function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduction of CO2 emissions due to lockdown measures","Impact":"Temporary reduction in emissions may lead to a false sense of environmental progress","Mitigation":"Implement systemic changes in energy infrastructure to ensure long-term reduction in emissions","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, carbon capture and storage","People":"Global population, particularly those affected by air pollution","Owner":"Policy makers, energy industry, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Increase in job losses due to lockdown and economic downturn","Impact":"Tens of millions of people losing jobs, leading to social and economic challenges","Mitigation":"Implement measures to protect and support affected individuals, create economic stimulus programs","Technologies":"Job training and re-skilling programs, economic relief initiatives","People":"Workers, businesses, governments","Owner":"Governments, businesses, social support organizations"},{"Description":"Risk of rebound in CO2 emissions after lockdown is lifted","Impact":"Potential rapid increase in emissions after lockdown, leading to environmental setbacks","Mitigation":"Invest in renewable energy infrastructure, implement long-term emissions reduction policies","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, carbon pricing mechanisms","People":"Global population, future generations","Owner":"Policy makers, energy industry, environmental organizations"}]}
